page.title: 03SPORTS DAY IN MALBOROUGH
page.content: Every year the school organises a {SPORTS DAY.}The school is divided into three teams. Each team is headed by a teacher. The teams are: {Brown,Lapthorn and Boyce.}They are named after our teachers. We have lots of different races.Here are some of them: bean-bag and bin, netball shooting,shuttle relay,flat race,stepping stones,egg and spoon, three legged. We also have a mothers race,a fathers race,and a toddlers race.The winners of these three races each get a prize. Each team tries its best to win as many races as possible.Depending on where you finish, i.e.1st,2nd,3rd etc.,you get a certain amount of points.At the end of the day all the points for each team are added up.The team with the most points wins the {TRINICK ROSE BOWL.
